author: leosimons
msg: Useful execution debugging and conditional checkouts.
* pygump/python/gump/config.py: configure gump.util.executor to log its command execution, and add a new section at the bottom of the config file for all the 'irregular' configuration bits like this.
* pygump/python/gump/util/executor.py, pygump/python/gump/test/testUtilExecutor.py: add some tweaks to gump.util.executor that make it possible to log all executed commands for easier debugging.

author: leosimons
msg: * pygump/python/gump/plugins/updater.py: update the updater plugins to use our new Popen class.

author: leosimons
msg: Ignore work directory for python imports.
* gump: don't attempt to import anything inside the pygump/work directory as python material. This is not our stuff after all :-D

author: scohen
msg: Improve fix to handle the case of numeric date formats and symbolic links.

author: scohen
msg: Handle the symbolic link case found by Neeme Praks
